name: Turd Evolution
description:
Inspired by Tapps Technology's iconic mobile clicker game Cow Evolution, Turd Evolution has you merging dung to create bigger and more mutated droppings. Collect points to upgrade gear and discover strange creatures.

This game is dedicated to my friend Michelle who reintroduced me to cow evolution and who inspired the toilet theme :)

Sorry for the ugly user interface, that has always been a struggle for me.

I am a highly inexperienced developer so any feedback is appreciated. I want to make sure that the game feels as smooth as possible to play, however nobody but myself has play-tested it. So if any of the mechanics feel intuitive please let me know!

Make sure to exit by holding the escape key. Otherwise the game won't save :P

This is also my first time implementing a save system to a game, so if you experience any hiccups relating to save files getting deleted or corrupted, let me know so I can both fix the issue and help recover any lost progress.

Please contact me if you encounter any crashes or bugs.
